data.name: AboutH3
data.value: Shaping the Future with Science, Technology, and Creativity KAR Robotics

data.name: AboutLi1
data.value: For us, it is a passion not only to use science and technology, but to understand and develop them.

data.name: AboutLi2
data.value: Respect, responsibility, and trust are our core values within the team.

data.name: AboutLi3
data.value: We believe that diverse ideas move us forward and value every individual’s contribution.

data.name: AboutLi4
data.value: We do not give up in the face of challenges, because progress comes through trying.

data.name: AboutLi5
data.value: As KAR Robotics, we believe that those who shape the future are the ones who dream, create, and share.

data.name: AboutP
data.value:
At KAR Robotics, our mission goes far beyond simply building robots. We aim to introduce young people to science, technology, and creativity, and to help them become conscious, productive, and future-ready individuals. In every project we undertake, our goal is not only to gain technical knowledge, but also to develop our way of thinking and share the power of learning.
The FRC journey teaches us more than engineering and coding; it builds self-confidence, perseverance, teamwork, and solidarity. Every project is a new way of producing together, thinking together, and achieving together as a team. We see every mistake as a learning opportunity and every success as the beginning of a new goal.

data.name: AboutP2
data.value: We are part of a generation that wants to take an active role in shaping the future. With creativity, guided by science, and driven by solidarity and hard work, we are here to leave a mark on our country’s future. As KAR Robotics, we believe that the future is built by those who dream, produce, and share.

data.name: CalltoactionH3
data.value: Let’s Raise the Engineers of the Future Together!

data.name: CalltoactionP
data.value: As KAR Robotics, we work to inspire young people in STEM fields, produce meaningful projects, and represent our country at the international level. Your support is not just an investment in a robot, but an investment in the future of young minds.

data.name: FeaturesPCode
data.value: Programs our robot’s autonomous and driver-controlled modes. Develops the entire software infrastructure, including sensor management, path algorithms, and strategic robot movements. Ensures that the robot operates reliably and efficiently throughout the competition.

data.name: FeaturesPElectronics
data.value: Builds the robot’s electrical infrastructure, including motors, sensors, wiring, and control systems. Ensures system safety and quickly resolves any electrical issues that may occur during competitions.

data.name: FeaturesPMechanics
data.value: Responsible for the robot’s physical design, chassis structure, and the production of all moving mechanisms. Creates CAD designs, manufactures parts, and manages the assembly process. Delivers a durable and high-performance robot on the field.

data.name: FeaturesPPR
data.value: Manages our communication with the outside world. Prepares social media content, conducts sponsorship meetings, and represents our team in schools, events, and communities in the best possible way. Strengthens our brand and helps spread the FRC culture to a wider audience.

data.name: ServicesPLast
data.value: Through workshops, robot demonstrations, and STEM events organized throughout the year, we reach hundreds of students. Our goal is not only to compete, but to inspire new generations, increase interest in technology, and create a lasting impact on society.

data.name: ServicesPMission
data.value: We work to increase young people’s interest in STEM fields, provide an environment where they can develop engineering, software, and design skills, and represent our school in the best possible way at national and international levels. Each season, we aim to reach and inspire more students.

data.name: ServicesPPro
data.value: We go beyond competition by acting with respect, kindness, and helpfulness. Even while competing, we support our opponents and prioritize collaboration. This approach forms the foundation of both FRC and our team philosophy.

data.name: ServicesPTeam
data.value: Team spirit, disciplined work, solidarity, and Gracious Professionalism are our core principles. We learn together, produce together, and overcome every challenge as a team. The growth of each member is valuable to us.

data.name: ServicesPVision
data.value: We aim to be part of a generation that produces technology, conducts research, and makes a difference in society. By building a sustainable team culture, we strive to become a role-model team in the FRC ecosystem through both our technical and social contributions.

data.name: ServicesPWho
data.value: KAR Robotics is a student team formed by Kartal Anatolian High School students, working within the FRC program to design and build robots while learning new technologies. Our goal is not only to build a robot, but to become a team that learns, produces, and inspires together, taking confident steps toward becoming the engineers of the future.
